stories.title: Survival story
stories.author: Anonymous
stories.text: In my psychology class we had a day where a hypnotist came in and students were able to participate if they paid a 10 dollar fee. So I did, and for all of the things the hypnotist had us participate in I was fully conscious of everything. I didn’t want the fear of missing out and having fun like all the other students seemed like they were. So I observed the behavior of the other students being hypnotized around me and tried to act like them. The hypnotist had us visualize that the students around us all looked like aliens which I didn’t see. She then had us react to pain by saying a certain word which I faked. Then she had me run to the next classroom over and yell “the aliens are invading”. Supposedly you’re not suppose to remember the things you do while hypnotized but I knew I was faking it the whole time. I feel like Hypnotism is real I was just a bit let down at the time that it didn’t work on me. This was a bit of a stupid confession but it just makes me cringe and I felt stupidly guilty at the time.

stories.title: Lung cancer
stories.author: Martin King
stories.text: It all started when I stole a fancy pen from a classmate. Then I started stealing anything I could steal. I stole a backpack from a school bus that I found under a seat. I stole a couple of toys I found on the ground during a field trip. I stole vanilla extract from a store. I stole gum from a mini market. I stole money from my aunt and my mom and my sister. I stole keys from a door in my school. I stole peoples lunch money. I stole a bunch of ice cream from my school's cafeteria. I stole 2 books from my school's library. I stole a classmate's pencil case which had a bunch of stuff in it. I stole another fancy expensive-looking pen and mechanical pencil from my 6th grade teacher. I'm sure I have stolen more stuff but I can't remember right now. I guess I just did all that for the thrill of it

stories.title: How I found meaning of life
stories.author: Thomas Albatros
stories.text: I'm 22 now but about 3 years ago , I fell on hard times, due to a mishap. At the time I had left home at 18 and was making head way for myself in life but then life happened. I had to move back into the abusive environment that I used to live in, I didn't have the strength that I once did have mentally ,and I was at rock bottom, during this times without a job , my step father whom was abusive to me growing up decided to offer a helping hand. Sadly, this was the biggest regret of my life , he ended trying to poison me ,taking advantage of me and basically making my life hell while my mother did nothing.
